mapper.select: SELECT target_three as targetThree, AVG(satisfyValue) as satisfyValue FROM ( SELECT target_three, SUM(quantity*score)/SUM(quantity) as satisfyValue FROM report_answer_quantity WHERE item_id=#{itemId} AND target_two=#{targetId} AND score!=0 GROUP BY question_id ) tb GROUP BY target_three
